rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CE.CEBODSYS

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66728

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CE.CESTRF

datasetVariables.description:
Describes the start of the clinical event relative to the sponsor-defined reference period. The sponsor-defined reference period is a continuous period of time defined by a discrete starting point and a discrete ending point (represented by RFSTDTC and RFENDTC in Demographics).
Not all values of the codelist are allowable for this variable. See Section 4.4.7, Use of Relative Timing Variables.
datasetVariables.label: Start Relative to Reference Period
datasetVariables.name: CESTRF

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66728

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CE.CEENRF

datasetVariables.description:
Describes the end of the event relative to the sponsor-defined reference period. The sponsor-defined reference period is a continuous period of time defined by a discrete starting point and a discrete ending point (represented by RFSTDTC and RFENDTC in Demographics).
Not all values of the codelist are allowable for this variable. See Section 4.4.7, Use of Relative Timing Variables.
datasetVariables.label: End Relative to Reference Period
datasetVariables.name: CEENRF

self.title: Start Relative to Reference Time Point

datasetVariables.description:
Identifies the start of the observation as being before or after the reference time point defined by variable CESTTPT.
Not all values of the codelist are allowable for this variable. See Section 4.4.7, Use of Relative Timing Variables.
datasetVariables.label: Start Relative to Reference Time Point
datasetVariables.name: CESTRTPT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable CE.CESTTPT

datasetVariables.label: Start Reference Time Point
datasetVariables.name: CESTTPT

datasetVariables.description:

Not all values of the codelist are allowable for this variable. See Section 4.4.7, Use of Relative Timing Variables.
datasetVariables.label: End Relative to Reference Time Point
datasetVariables.name: CEENRTPT

datasetVariables.name: CEENTPT

description: An events domain that contains clinical events of interest that would not be classified as adverse events. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C85441, 2018-06-29)
label: Clinical Events
name: CE
